overview: From 2025-10-24 to 2025-10-25, Sendo-labs/leaderboard had 4 new PRs (3 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: X social scoring
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## X/Twitter Integration

Implements basic X activity tracking for users who link their accounts.

### What's Working
- ‚úÖ OAuth linking via Cloudflare Worker
- ‚úÖ JWT-based account verification
- ‚úÖ Activity ingestion pipeline (mentions, posts, retweets, replies)
- ‚úÖ Database schema (socialAccounts, xActivities)
- ‚úÖ Social score calculation and aggregation
- ‚úÖ UI display (ùïè icon on leaderboard, activity stats on profiles)

### Implementation
- **API**: twitterapi.io for scraping (1 req/5s rate limit)
- **Query**: `@SendoMarket OR from:SendoMarket include:nativeretweets` captures all relevant activity in 1 call
- **Strategy**: Global search + filter by linked users (scales efficiently)
- **Storage**: Idempotent upserts, engagement metrics updated on each run

### What's Missing for the moment
- Multi-platform architecture (LK, TG and others)
- Detailed activity lists and charts
- Advanced UI components (tabs, graphs, filters)

### Testing
Pipeline successfully runs daily, captures activities from linked accounts.

topContributors.summary: standujar: Focused on enhancing the CI/CD pipeline and feature development, merging two PRs in Sendo-labs/leaderboard, including #8 which allows manual workflow dispatch on any branch, and also opened PR #7 to further improve the deploy workflow. Their code changes primarily involved feature work and configuration updates across 21 files.

MonteCrypto999: Focused on significant feature development, opening PR Sendo-labs/plugin-jupiter#1 to add referral fee support and live E2E scripts, which involved substantial code changes across 31 files (+5965/-431 lines) and 13 commits, primarily in feature work, other work, bugfix work, and docs work, touching code, config, and tests.
